US.meaning: All ages admitted. Nothing that would offend parents for viewing by children.
Some material may not be suitable for children. Parents urged to give "parental guidance". May contain some material parents might not like for their young children.
Some material may be inappropriate for children under 13. Parents are urged to be cautious. Some material may be inappropriate for pre-teenagers.
Under 17 requires accompanying parent or adult guardian. Contains some adult material. Parents are urged to learn more about the film before taking their young children with them.
No One 17 and Under Admitted. Clearly adult. Children are not admitted.

GB.meaning: All ages admitted. Nothing that would offend parents for viewing by children.
Parental Guidance. General viewing, but some scenes may be unsuitable for young children.
Cinema release suitable for 12 years and over. No-one younger than 12 may see a 12A film in a cinema unless accompanied by an adult.
Only those over 15 years are admitted. Nobody younger than 15 can rent or buy a 15-rated film.
Only adults are admitted. Nobody younger than 18 can rent or buy an 18-rated film.
